name: Picross My Heart
description:
Take a journey with Cupid around the world, solving puzzles while racing the clock! Solve 30 Picross puzzles using your wits and reflexes. Go at your own pace and take it easy, or race the clock and beat your best time!

Once every blue moon and a half, Cupid must travel among her kind to uncover the many objects of our world using the power of Picross. Since our dear Cupid is but a novice to the art of Picross-ery, she will need your help to decipher the grids and uncover their secrets!
